EULA.title: End-User License Agreement (EULA) for AIron Fitness

sections.title: License Grant
sections.content: Subject to compliance with this Agreement, AIron Fitness grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to access and use the AIron Fitness platform for personal, non-commercial use. This license allows you to utilize the fitness plans and related services provided by AIron Fitness.

sections.title: User Accounts and Personal Information
sections.content: In order to access certain features of AIron Fitness, you may be required to create a user account. You agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information during the registration process. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account login credentials, and any activity that occurs under your account is your responsibility.

sections.title: Fitness Plans and Advice
sections.content: The fitness plans and advice provided by AIron Fitness are for informational purposes only. Users should consult with a qualified healthcare provider before starting any fitness program, especially if they have any medical conditions or concerns. AIron Fitness is not responsible for any injuries or damages that may result from the use of its fitness plans or advice.

sections.title: Data Privacy
sections.content: AIron Fitness respects your privacy and handles personal information in accordance with its Privacy Policy. By using the AIron Fitness platform, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in the Privacy Policy.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: The AIron Fitness platform, including its content, features, and designs, are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You agree not to copy, modify, distribute, transmit, display, perform, or create derivative works of the AIron Fitness platform or any of its content unless expressly permitted by AIron Fitness.

sections.title: Modifications and Updates
sections.content: AIron Fitness may update, modify, or discontinue the platform or any part thereof at any time, with or without notice. AIron Fitness is not liable to you or any third party for any such updates, modifications, or discontinuation.

sections.title: Disclaimer of Warranty
sections.content: The AIron Fitness platform is provided 'as is' and 'as available,' without any warranties, express or implied. AIron Fitness disclaims all warranties, including but not limited to fitness for a particular purpose, non-infringement, and accuracy of information.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: In no event shall AIron Fitness be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in any way connected with the use of the AIron Fitness platform, even if AIron Fitness has been advised of the possibility of such damages.

sections.title: Indemnification
sections.content: You agree to indemnify and hold AIron Fitness, its affiliates, officers, employees, and agents harmless from any claims, damages, liabilities, and expenses (including attorney's fees) arising from your use of the AIron Fitness platform or your breach of this Agreement.

sections.title: Termination
sections.content: AIron Fitness may terminate this Agreement and your access to the platform at any time, without cause or notice. Upon termination, you must cease all use of the AIron Fitness platform and delete any downloaded materials.

sections.title: Governing Law
sections.content: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law principles.

sections.title: Entire Agreement
sections.content: This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between you and AIron Fitness concerning the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior or contemporaneous agreements, representations, warranties, and understandings.
